description: Designed and automated the creation of 4,000+ electric plant data tags using Python and SQL, significantly reducing manual tagging and improving data accessibility across operational/non-operational datasets for electric plant systems
additionalDescription: Implemented Selenium regression tests to validate workflows end-to-end, shorten test cycles & prevent release regressions.
thirdDescription: Cut QA time by 60% by partnering with engineers and analysts to deploy AI-powered validation tools, accelerating reporting timelines and data integrity for plant operations.
fourthDescription: Built a lakehouse pipeline on AWS using S3, Glue (PySpark), Athena, and Redshift with schema evolution and partition projection, enabling scalable, interactive queries across millions of electric utility data points.

description: Migrated startup from Monday.com to ClickUp, improving workflows for marketing, sales, operations, and HR with automation and integrations.
Collaborated with the CEO of Axial to revamp the frontend using React, Tailwind CSS, and Ethereum API for integration into a modular blockchain framework.
Developed university-level projects including a book catalog and coding prep platform using Vue.js, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

description: Developed new features for Android and iOS using Dart, Flutter, and AWS.
